description:
AGENDA
**18.00 – 18:30 Meet & Greet**
\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-
**18:30 - 19:30 Challenges Managing Data for the Funds Industry**

**by Nigel Fulcher**, Development Manager at Broadridge.

Broadridge FCS offers data, digital and regulatory solutions to leading asset managers and investment platforms. Nigel will speak about challenges with historic systems and how the team has built a new, extendable data platform using Azure.
\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-
**19:30 - 20:00 Pizza and Networking**
\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-
**20:00 - Pub**
\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-
title: Challenges Managing Data for the Funds Industry
